        private void handleSaveAs​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the "Save As" function, by saving the note locally
        Parameters:
        e - {ActionEvent} is the action of the event
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - path is invalid

      • saveAs

        public void saveAs()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Handles the "Save As" function, by saving the note locally. This method is separate since other function call it.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - path is invalid
